SELECT a.id, a.admission_time admissionTime, a.graduation_time graduationTime, a.graduction_school graductionSchool, a.major major, DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') createTime, a.enclosure, b.user_name userName, b.job_number jobNumber, b.state, d.`name` educationName, c.`name` learningModalityName, e.`name` schoolNatureName FROM sys_staff_education a LEFT JOIN sys_staff_data_dictionary d ON a.education_id = d.id LEFT JOIN sys_staff_data_dictionary c ON a.learning_modality_id = c.id LEFT JOIN sys_staff_data_dictionary e ON a.school_nature = e.id, sys_eve_user_staff b WHERE a.staff_id = b.id
AND a.graduction_school LIKE '%${graductionSchool}%'
AND b.user_name LIKE '%${userName}%'
AND b.job_number LIKE '%${jobNumber}%'
AND b.state = #{state}
ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_staff_education (id, education_id, admission_time, graduation_time, graduction_school, major, learning_modality_id, school_nature, enclosure, staff_id, create_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{educationId}, #{admissionTime}, #{graduationTime}, #{graductionSchool}, #{major}, #{learningModalityId}, #{schoolNature}, #{enclosureInfo}, #{staffId}, #{createTime})
